item.title: Data-Driven Agriculture
item.description: Problem The Green Rush has resulted in a skewed marketplace subject to price volatility. Diversification is the key to weathering the storm of wild market swings. Responsible Agriculture Less water. Less fertilizer. Less waste. Fewer pesticides. We are all collective stewards of our environment. These goals may seem at odds with profit margins, but through creative solutions and robust analytics, we help you achieve responsible growth for your plants and your business.

item.title: Extraction and Testing
item.description: Precision Testing equipment has some natural variation built in to it that scientists are used to handling. However, classical statistical methods fail to address the natural variability present in different batches of product. The approach we take is rooted in cutting-edge computational mathematics to maximize the utility of information and address the underlying uncertainty in potency inherent to the cannabis plants. Efficiency We can use the latest developments from simulation-based optimal experimental design to adapt your testing regiments to budgetary and temporal constraints.

item.title: Investment Consulting
item.description: Insights Growth is central to your survival. Funders want to know the risks of their ventures, and we bridge the gap between their concerns and your ambitions. Strategy We help you actualize goals into reality by crafting rigorous business plans. As you already know, big plans come with big unknowns. Let us quantify them. By helping you identify and assess risks, we allow your business to try new ideas without sacrificing potential profits.
